title: EPIC ANNIE SKIN IDEA
body:
The idea is sweetheart Annie and she would be pimped all over with sweets, lollies,cakes on her dress.
Q     Throws out a big cupcake
W     Fairy floss comes out in a cone
E       Instead if the fire shield she has a massive donut
R, best of all robbers turns into a gummy bear

What do u guys think? And rito plzzzzz

replies.body: Either you're being a troll or just plain stupid.
U do realise that that's already been done and is in the pbe now right?

> [{quoted}](name=TechnoFlame,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=V6XLPRL5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-05T10:30:42.436+0000)
>
> U do realise that that's already been done and is in the pbe now right?

I meant lolliannie cuz that's not an actual skin yet
wait about a month or two and see. I think riot will love it :)
Sweetheart Annie is already a thing and is in pbe,....

> [{quoted}](name=TechnoFlame,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=V6XLPRL5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-06T07:31:50.148+0000)

I should rename it that's all
I mean like a lolliannie not that valentine annie
